name: Ghost Squad
overview:
A 1 to 2 player 3-D military combat shooting game with a wide-variety of special features and options.

Per Sega: 'Ghost Global Humanitarian Operation Special Tactics Squad has nothing to do with ghosts as the title may suggest but everything to do with beating terrorism on the world stage, saving world leaders and capturing hostages.

You are a member of Special Forces and fights against very dangerous operations, such as an eradication of terrorism and a rescue of the President.

You'll have an exhilarating experience through this GUN SHOOTING GAME, which reproduces Special Forces' operations with full of reality and a machine gun.'
